instructions.title: How to use JPG to PDF Converter

steps.title: Upload JPG/JPEG images
steps.description: Drag and drop multiple JPG or JPEG images into the upload area, or click to browse and select files from your computer. Supports both .jpg and .jpeg file extensions.

steps.title: Reorder your images
steps.description: Use the up/down arrow buttons to rearrange JPG images in your desired order. The sequence determines how pages will appear in the final PDF document.

steps.title: Configure PDF settings
steps.description: Click the settings icon to choose page size (A4, Letter, A3, Legal, Tabloid, Custom), image fit mode (contain, cover, fill, none), margins (0-100pt), and output filename.

steps.title: Generate and download PDF
steps.description: Click Generate PDF to create your document. Once processing completes, download the PDF file to your device. Each JPG image becomes one page in the final PDF.
